homestead-init: vagrant ssh -c "cd code && php artisan migrate:refresh --seed"
homestead-test: vagrant ssh -c "cd code && composer run test"
deploy: [ -z "$DEPLOY_APP_KEY" ] && echo ERROR: missing \'DEPLOY_APP_KEY\' environment variable >&2 && exit 1 || sed -i'' s/APP_KEY=.*/APP_KEY=$DEPLOY_APP_KEY/ .env.production
